titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LONG HEAD BICEPS TENOTOMY PERFORMED INDICATOR (SHOULDER REPLACEMENT) - Description

div.p: LONG HEAD BICEPS TENOTOMY PERFORMED INDICATOR (SHOULDER REPLACEMENT) is the same as attribute JOINT REPLACEMENT PATIENT PROCEDURE PERFORMED INDICATOR to indicate whether a Long Head Biceps (LHB) tenotomy (cutting of a tendon) was performed on a PATIENT during Primary Shoulder Replacement Surgery or Revision Shoulder Replacement Surgery.
